Text: Somebody want to tell me what this does? I can't find any info on it anywhere. By, "undub" does that mean that this patch removes the English voices or something?

changes english dub into 
original japanese

only use this patch with http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3931754/Final_Fantasy_XII_USA_UNDUB of course... and if u don't have it yet please get it... it is SO much better than the English version. You could always be a good boya and buy the English version, download the un-dub and feel happy because you didn't pirate ;-)
there are missing sound in some cutscene even after patching :(

Thanks, I've got the game in full english but would like to redo it with japanese voices. 

But, I downladed both your 2 torrents, patched and then burnt the iso after patch and... :

It seems that several voices are missing, expecially on 1/3th of cut-scenes. Subtitltes are there, but no voice. 

Good work though !

waha, fluffy kitty..
if you're in touch with the great dude doing those undubs, could you ask wether it's possible to create a patch to PUT THE CONTROLS BACK TO THE JAPANESE ONES for FFXII ?
(swap cancel/select basically)
Thanks a bunch..
I'll try to find more ways to contact fluffy kitty in the meantime..
yeah this one's a good effort but there are still quite  a few cutscenes with voiceovers completely missing -- the 'story' ones are all there, but many mid-quest ones are missing.
